casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwarn Lee ROGERS 63A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 23, 2017 Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, Wyatt Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Rogers, Antwarn Lee. Heather H. Freeman, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of February 2017."
